name: D6: Doctor Dice’s Dungeon of Dangerous Demonic Dice (minijam83)
name_original: D6: Doctor Dice’s Dungeon of Dangerous Demonic Dice (minijam83)
description:
As the Hero, enter the dungeon and fight off waves of demonic monster dice!

WASD - to move

Left click  to fire

Right click to dash (Only if you have enough charges)

R to reload

Complete rounds quickly and earn up to three D6's  to roll between rounds to earn points to upgrade your character!

This game was originally created for Minijam83:Dread, A 72hr Game Jam where the limitation was "Dice as main mechanic" . D6 takes that VERY literally and incorporates Dice roll RNG into a lot of its mechanics as well as featuring Mutated D6's as the enemies you'll meet inside the dungeon.

We had an amazing time working on this game jam and are looking at improving the project further in the future by adding in more enemy types, levels, weapons and other features that we decided to cut for the Jam submission to ensure we kept a reasonable scope.  We hope you enjoy ! Any and all feedback is appreciated! Find a bug?  Please feel free to let us know, any and all information you can provide on how to replicate the bug helps us ensure it gets squashed !
